Pete,
Furukogai and Ko-Kogai are the same book, just two different readings.  It's definitely worth getting.  I can't think of a book titled just Kogai.

Jim





  Jim, Gordon, Alan et.al.; do you know if the book(s) 'Kogai', 'Ko 
  Kogai' and 'Furukogai' are one in the same? I have been reading some 
  descriptions from the Sotheby London 9 November 2004 catalog and they 
  list 'Furukogai' and 'Ko Kogai' as well as the 'Mitokoro Shu' by Ikeda 
  which I already have. I have been attempting to find research books on 
  kogai and, although I know they are all difficult to locate, it would 
  be of great help knowing if there is actually more than one book to be 
  looking for.
  Thanks as always!
  Pete Klein
  .
